description.value:
You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

Add the draconic bloodline's granted spells to your spell list; you must still learn them or add them to your repertoire as normal. These spells are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shield], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Haste], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Chromatic Wall], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mask of Terror], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Prismatic Wall], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Overwhelming Presence].
